articles.content: On Wednesday, Apple made iOS 17.2 beta 3 available to the public. The update adds a bunch of small but solid improvements — if you can endure some of the inevitable bugs that always accompany beta so… [+2990 chars]

articles.title: Alan Wake II is great, but it doesn't need guns - Engadget
articles.description: Alan Wake II is fantastic. Remedy calls the game its "first foray into the survival horror genre'— which makes its reliance on guns perplexing.
articles.content: Alan Wake II is a fantastic game. It tells a twisted, serpentine story of paranormal murder, shifting realities and demonic possession, with two brooding investigators at its core. Developers at Reme… [+7353 chars]
